thread.title: EMC's Mountains Of Cash Prove To Be A Mirage For Bondholders
thread.title_full: EMC's Mountains Of Cash Prove To Be A Mirage For Bondholders

title: EMC's Mountains Of Cash Prove To Be A Mirage For Bondholders
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Technology - Today 
Was the appeal of lending money to a company with roughly $3 in cash for every $1 it borrowed too good to be true? It appears so....
